Texto: 
non-contributory
gamma knife radiotherapy
• small lesion superior aspect of vermis with multiple flow voids
• developmental venous anomaly (dva) draining the pons
cerebral arteriovenous malformation (avm)
dva pons
avm
cavernous malformation
hemangioblastoma
60 year old man who had ct scan for headache 1 year ago.  this was followed up with mri.
